name: The Only One
description:
"The only one" is a short adventure game made for Ludum Dare 27. The theme for this Ludum Dare was "10 seconds."

The game tells the story of an inventor whose wife has recently passed away. He has isolated himself ever since. Then a ring that was very special to him breaks and he gets stuck in a spiral he can't get out of without outside help.

Use the arrow keys to move and spacebar to interact/ advance.
